message: Hi Bob, I propose that I take $20 and you get $80. Since you'll lose 20% of the value if we continue to later rounds, this offer gives you the full payoff you could secure in your turn at the next step. I hope you find this fair and efficient.

Hi Alice, thanks for your offer, but I think we can find something more equitable. Let's split 60/40, recognizing the time pressure we both face. This way we both benefit substantially from reaching an agreement now.
